Mutthipupphiya Thera：An arahant．In the time of Padumuttara Buddha he was a garland maker，named Sudassana，and offered the Buddha a handful of jasmine flowers．Thirty six kappas ago he became king sixteen times under the name of Devuttara （Ap．i．142）．

He is evidently identical with Añjanavaniya．ThagA．i．128．
